description: Masashi, is one of Naota`s classmates. He is friends with Naota and is often seen hanging out with Gaku and Ninamori. Masashi also has a job as a delivery boy, and drives a truck around, even though he is only in grade school. His father`s truck is later eaten by the terminal core when Mamimi loses control of it. Masashi, like Naota, generally sounds slightly depressed.
name: Masamune Masashi
